lines.text: I see. Vodka not for boys.
[Takes a drink and spits it out]
You read these funny books. You make pretend, you play soldier. American propaganda. Kill Arab, kill gook, kill Russkie. Very nice.
[After a Russian naval book washes ashore]
All I know is, whoever lost it's probably dead now.
Because man, in Russia if you screw up, they don't give you a second chance to explain yourself. They just kill you.
Say if, I mean, what if a Russian washed up on the beach here. What would you do?
